Hosted by UW-Madison's [ML+X Community](https://datascience.wisc.edu/ml-community), each monthly forum highlights 2-3 machine learning applications that share a theme followed by communal discussions.

1. Multimodal learning and analysis for understanding single-cell functional genomics in brains and brain diseases, Daifeng Wang

2. Transforming healthcare: AI-enhanced disease quantification with vision-language models, Zachary Huemann

3. The benefits of early fusion: deeply integrated audio-visual representation learning, Pedro Morgado
